newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: Bahrain 91-day treasury bill rate up at 5.49 pct.
newsitem.headline: Bahrain 91-day treasury bill rate up at 5.49 pct.

text.p: The average rate at this week's tender for 10 million dinars worth of 91-day Bahrain treasury bills rose to 5.49 percent from last week's 5.48 percent, a Bahrain Monetary Agency spokesman said on Monday.
The average price dropped slightly to 98.631 from 98.633. The minimum price accepted was 98.629.
Banks submitted bids for 22.1 million dinars worth of bills, up from 20.6 a week ago.
The bills are offered on Monday and issued on Wednesday.
